title: Ten years after crash, Americans still wary of stocks
text:
Ten years after crash, Americans still wary of stocks   01:41 
Ten years after the start of the financial crisis that erased $16.4 trillion in assets from U.S. households, Americans have yet to embrace the U.S. stock market with the same fervor as before   
Ten years after the start of the financial crisis that erased $16.4 trillion in assets from U.S. households, Americans have yet to embrace the U.S. stock market with the same fervor as before  //reut.rs/2IwEKgO
